document.full_text: jumping into a dispute over college sports mascots that some native american groups consider offensive, north dakota lawmakers on friday passed a bill requiring the university of north dakota to keep its "fighting sioux" nickname and indian head logo.
document.title: north dakota lawmakers vote to keep "fighting sioux"
lines_and_colors: jumping into a dispute over college sports mascots that some native american groups consider offensive, north dakota lawmakers on friday passed a bill requiring the university of north dakota to keep its "fighting sioux" nickname and indian head logo.
